ValidationRule.description: You must enter today's date in Setup Complete Date field. Once a date has been entered, it cannot be changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <>"2008-09 Operations Administration",ISCHANGED(Setup_Complete_Date__c ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Setup_Complete_Date__c ))), true, IF(NOT(Setup_Complete_Date__c = TODAY()), true, false) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter today's date in Setup Complete Date field. Once a date has been entered, it cannot be changed.
